extends java.lang.Object

      • addEmployee

        public void addEmployee(int id,
                        java.lang.String fname,
                        java.lang.String lname,
                        java.lang.String dob,
                        java.lang.String gender,
                        java.lang.String no,
                        java.lang.String address,
                        java.lang.String pos,
                        java.lang.String jdate,
                        java.lang.String tdate)
                 throws java.sql.SQLException,
                        DatabaseConnectionException
        Adds a new employee to the database.
        Specified by:
        addEmployee in interface IEmployeeService
        Parameters:
        id - the ID of the employee to be added.
        fname - the first name of the employee.
        lname - the last name of the employee.
        dob - the date of birth of the employee.
        gender - the gender of the employee.
        no - the phone number of the employee.
        address - the address of the employee.
        pos - the position of the employee.
        jdate - the join date of the employee.
        tdate - the termination date of the employee.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - If a database access error occurs.
        DatabaseConnectionException - If there is an issue with the database connection.

        str - the attribute to be updated (address/position/phone_no).
